scene_01.speaker: kiupita
scene_01.text: After the winter formal, I realized something...

scene_02.speaker: kiupita
scene_02.text: We've been friends for a while now, but it feels like we're growing apart instead of closer.

scene_03.speaker: kiupita
scene_03.text: I thought we had something special, but... maybe I was wrong.

scene_04.speaker: kiupita
scene_04.text: I think it's time we accept that we're better off going our separate ways.

scene_05.text: After graduation, you lose touch completely. What could have been will remain a mystery.

final.text: BAD ENDING - You made it far, but couldn't seal the deal. The relationship ended with regret and what-ifs.
